text: Damian "Jr. Gong" Marley (born July 21, 1978 in Kingston, Jamaica) is a Jamaican singer, songwriter, rapper and DJ. Marley has won four Grammy Awards. He is the son of Bob Marley. == Personal life == Marley has released four studio albums. Marley has ten siblings: Ky-Mani, Julian, Stephanie, Karen, Rohan, Robbie, Stephen, Ziggy, Cedella and Sharon. Marley has a football team named after him in England called FC Zion. ==Discography== Damian Marley has released 4 studio albums: Year Album 1996 Mr. Marley 2001 Halfway Tree 2005 Welcome to Jamrock 2010 Distant Relatives == References == == Other websites == * Damian Marley official website Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Jamaican singers Category:Rastafari Category:Jamaican reggae musicians Marley, Bob Category:Grammy Award winners
title: Damian Marley
